page.title: 16RECREATION IN EGMERE AREA
page.content: The most popular recreation is {gardening.}Nearly everyone said that they gardened for pleasure. Most grew a variety of flowers (Roses and Spring flowers being very popular). They also grew a range of vegetables: potatoes, carrots, brassica, peas, salad crops and soft fruit for personal use. One lady grows vegetables for sale at the local market for Women's Institute funds. Other{outdoor recreations include fishing, cycling, football, tennis and swimming.{Indoor hobbies included watching T.V., reading, doing crosswords, organ and piano playing, knitting, sewing, handicrafts in general and interior decotrating, as an unavoidable evil. Several men enjoy an evening out at Walsingham or Creake to play darts, snooker or pool - as well as downing an occasion a pint or two of Norwich Best Bitter.
